review_data.title: Great find
review_data.content: New Year’s Eve spent at convivio. A great set menu, pre paid so I forget what the financial pain was ( being Zürich it was expensive) with paired wines. Food, service and atmosphere were excellent. Be happy to recommend this fine restaurant. Happy 2020.
